name: Block Battle (G.I. Productions)
description:
An incredibly easy to learn fast paced 1V1 local multiplayer platform fighting game. Dash into your enemy to gain points and kill them. Thats it. Controller support included.

Player 1 controls:

Move: WASD or Left joystick.

Jump: W or A.

Dash: Space or right bumper.

Player 2 controls:

Move: IJKL or Left Joystick

Jump: I or A.

Dash: Shift or Right bumper.
